lead_paragraph: The National Football League has chosen Twitter as its exclusive global partner for streaming its Thursday night games during the 2016 regular season, the parties said on Tuesday, a deal that could help the social media site expand its user base.

headline.print_headline: Twitter to Stream Thursday Night NFL Games in 2016 Season
headline.main: Twitter to Stream Thursday Night NFL Games in 2016 Season
